description:
I loved the idea of this pairing right from the start!
There's just something about a hot, buff, young stud fucking a hot, muscular dude that's a bit older than he is.
Especially if the fucking is a bit rough!
I have to wonder about Dennis, but in a good way. He's mentioned several times that he likes it hard and it seems like the harder it is, and the bigger the dick that's doing it, the more he likes it!
Jake and Dennis connected immediately. I think Dennis was pretty excited when he first saw Jake.
And he got just what he wanted — a good, hard pounding!
title: Jake & Dennis
